content:
There are certainly many modern-day athletes who have achieved great success and could be considered on par with the athletes from 1988. Here are a few examples:

1. Simone Biles: American gymnast Simone Biles has won a total of 30 Olympic and World Championship medals, including 19 golds, making her the most decorated gymnast in history.

2. Usain Bolt: Jamaican sprinter Usain Bolt is often considered the greatest sprinter of all time. He has won a total of eight Olympic gold medals and holds world records in the 100m and 200m.

3. Michael Phelps: American swimmer Michael Phelps is the most decorated Olympian of all time, with a total of 28 medals, including 23 golds. He also holds world records in several events.

4. Serena Williams: American tennis player Serena Williams has won 23 Grand Slam titles and four Olympic gold medals. She is considered by many to be one of the greatest tennis players of all time.

These athletes, like those from 1988, have achieved their success through hard work, dedication, and natural talent.
